verbs.description: [ARG0: sofia vergara] [V: loses] [ARG1: custody battle over frozen embryos] sofia vergara ex - fiance nick loeb has taken her to court for control of two human embryos they created back in 2013 in an attempt to have a child via surrogate nick loeb district courts of new zealand sofía vergara
